proceedLimitOrderDataTitle: Would you like to proceed with the following limit order data?
proceedLimitOrderDataDescription: The {{cardType}} limit order form above will be filled out with the following market order data.
sellingQuoteForBase: Selling {{totalQuote}} {{assetA}} in exchange for at least {{totalBase}} {{assetB}}

loadingMarketOrdersDescription: Fetching requested market data, please wait...
buyLimitOrdersDescription: The following table displays network offers to purchase {{assetA}} with {{assetB}}
sellLimitOrdersDescription: The following table displays network offers to sell {{assetA}} for {{assetB}}
